com.opengamma.strata.pricer.swap

Class DiscountingDeliverableSwapFutureTradePricer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.pricer.swap.AbstractDeliverableSwapFutureTradePricer
      • com.opengamma.strata.pricer.swap.DiscountingDeliverableSwapFutureTradePricer

  • public class DiscountingDeliverableSwapFutureTradePricer
extends AbstractDeliverableSwapFutureTradePricer
    Pricer implementation for deliverable swap futures.

    This function provides the ability to price a DeliverableSwapFutureTrade.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DiscountingDeliverableSwapFutureTradePricer DEFAULT
      Default implementation.

      • price

        public double price(DeliverableSwapFutureTrade trade,
                    RatesProvider provider)
        Calculates the price of the underlying deliverable swap futures product.

        The price of the trade is the price on the valuation date.

        Parameters:
        trade - the trade to price
        provider - the rates provider
        Returns:
        the price of the trade, in decimal form

      • presentValue

        public CurrencyAmount presentValue(DeliverableSwapFutureTrade trade,
                                   RatesProvider provider,
                                   double referencePrice)
        Calculates the present value of the deliverable swap futures trade.

        The present value of the product is the value on the valuation date.

        Parameters:
        trade - the trade to price
        provider - the rates provider
        referencePrice - the price with respect to which the margining should be done. The reference price is the trade price before any margining has taken place and the price used for the last margining otherwise.
        Returns:
        the present value

      • presentValueSensitivity

        public PointSensitivities presentValueSensitivity(DeliverableSwapFutureTrade trade,
                                                  RatesProvider provider)
        Calculates the present value sensitivity of the deliverable swap futures trade.

        The present value sensitivity of the trade is the sensitivity of the present value to the underlying curves.

        Parameters:
        trade - the trade to price
        provider - the rates provider
        Returns:
        the present value curve sensitivity of the trade

      • currencyExposure

        public MultiCurrencyAmount currencyExposure(DeliverableSwapFutureTrade trade,
                                            RatesProvider provider,
                                            double referencePrice)
        Calculates the currency exposure of the deliverable swap futures trade.

        Since the deliverable swap futures is based on a single currency, the trade is exposed to only this currency.

        Parameters:
        trade - the trade to price
        provider - the rates provider
        referencePrice - the price with respect to which the margining should be done. The reference price is the trade price before any margining has taken place and the price used for the last margining otherwise.
        Returns:
        the currency exposure of the trade
